articles.author: Horaci Garcia, Guillermo Martinez
articles.title: Spain election: Voting starts in poll that could see Socialists lose power - Reuters
articles.description: Spaniards began voting on Sunday in a potentially close-run general election that could see Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez's governing Socialists lose power and a far-right party ma…
articles.content: MADRID, July 23 (Reuters) - Spaniards began voting on Sunday in a potentially close-run general election that could see Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez's governing Socialists lose power and a far-right … [+3989 chars]
